scripts.npos3d-build: rimraf out/npos3d && parcel build npos3d/*.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir out/npos3d && git add out/npos3d/*
scripts.3d-cubes-build: rimraf out/3d-cubes && parcel build 3d-cubes/*.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir out/3d-cubes && git add out/3d-cubes/*
scripts.tri-build: rimraf out/tri && parcel build tri/*.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir out/tri && git add out/tri/*
scripts.3d-gltf-build: rimraf out/3d-gltf && parcel build 3d-gltf/*.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir out/3d-gltf && git add out/3d-gltf/*
scripts.elcom-build: rimraf out/elcom && parcel build elcom/*.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir out/elcom && git add out/elcom/*
scripts.canvas-mesh-build: rimraf out/canvas-mesh && parcel build canvas-mesh/index.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir out/canvas-mesh && git add out/canvas-mesh/*
scripts.canvas-figures-build: rimraf out/canvas-figures && parcel build canvas-figures/index.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir out/canvas-figures && git add out/canvas-figures/*
